title: Protest opposite Dhammika Perera’s residence
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A protest was held today opposite the residence of Dhammika Perera, who was recently named as a National List MP of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna.
The protest started from opposite the Nelum Pokuna Theater, and the protesters marched to Dhammika Perera’s residence at Albert Crescent.
Fuel Crisis: Sri Lanka to register consumers for weekly fuel quota
